jaeger.name: Jaeger
jaeger.description: Jaeger is a Mythic-quality Generation 3 hero in Kingshot, classified under the Archer class. You can unlock him through the Daily Deals and the Strongest Governor Event.

skills.name: Sound of Silence – Conquest Skill
skills.description: “Hush now and watch the master work”. Jaeger silences and prevents the target from using skills for `5s` (skills already cast are not affected), dealing Attack * `300%` damage.

skills.name: Hymn to Survival – Expedition Skill
skills.description: No ease or luxury can be enjoyed unless the lives of soldiers are well-guarded. Jaeger increases Defender Squads’ Health by `15%`.

skills.name: Fatal Attraction
skills.description: Like a siren’s deadly song, Jaeger deals Attack * `224%` damage to enemies in the target area and stuns them for 2s.

skills.name: Game of Chance
skills.description: Jaeger’s deadliest performances are also his most unpredictable. If successful, Jaeger deals Attack * `300%` damage or else restores the target’s Health equal to his Attack * 50%.

skills.name: Rumormonger
skills.description: A wandering bard’s knows how to take advantage of loose lips, increasing Enemy Damage Taken by `30%` for 3s.

skills.name: The Tempest `(LEAD)`
skills.description: Jaeger’s triumphant music is a fine tool of intimidation, granting a 20% chance of increasing Squad’s damage dealt by `40%` for 3 turns.

skills.name: The Resistance
skills.description: Music focuses the soldier’s mind. Jaeger grants all squads a 20% chance of reducing the total Enemy Squad’s Lethality by `50%` for 2 turns when attacking.

skills.name: The Celebration
skills.description: A rousing song unlocks new reserves of strength. Increases the total Squad’s Health by `25%`.

eric.name: Eric
eric.description: Eric is a Mythic-quality Generation 3 Hero in Kingshot, classified under the Infantry class. You can unlock him through the Hall of Heroes.

skills.name: Blessed Hammer – Conquest Skill
skills.description: Eric trusts not himself but his blessed warhammer, increasing damage by `30%`.

skills.name: Vanguard – Expedition Skill
skills.description: A paladin must always lead by example from the front. Eric increases Defender Squad Defense by `15%`.

skills.name: Ground Shock
skills.description: Eric imperils the ground with an almighty smash of his blessed hammer, dealing Attack * `168%` damage to the target ahead while reducing targets’ Attack Speed by 50% for 4s.

skills.name: Veterancy
skills.description: Battle blows and armor scars are naught but glory for a paladin. Attacks against Eric have a `16%` chance of increasing Defense by `20%` for 2 seconds (max 5 stacks).

skills.name: Hammer of Justice
skills.description: Eric casts his warhammer into the ground, dealing Attack * `112%` damage in a fan-shaped arc with a 30% chance of stunning the targets for 1s.

skills.name: Holy Warrior
skills.description: The purity of Eric’s faith can cause even his enemies to stumble, reducing the total Enemy Squads’ Attack by `20%`.

skills.name: Conviction
skills.description: Conviction is a shield for the righteous, reducing Squads’ Damage Taken by `20%`.

skills.name: Exhortation
skills.description: An inspiring leader can unlock new reserves of vitality. Eric increases the total Squads’ Health by 25%.

petra.name: Petra
petra.description: Petra is a Mythic-quality Generation 3 Hero in Kingshot, classified under the Cavalry class. You can unlock her through Hero Roulette.

skills.name: Weighted Deck – Conquest Skill
skills.description: Petra has become more skilled at weighting the cards of fate in her favor, increasing the upper and lower limit of her fluctuating skills by `150%`.

skills.name: Cosmic Eye – Expedition Skill
skills.description: “Strike!” The cards never fail to inform Petra of the right time to act. Petra increases Rally Squad Attack by `15%`.

skills.name: Dichotomoy
skills.description: Petra throws a tarot card at an enemy, dealing Attack * `378%` damage and inflicting one of the following effects: reducing the target’s Attack by 20% for 2s or stunning the target for 1.5s.

skills.name: Change of Fate
skills.description: Petra curses an enemy, dealing floating damage based on the base value of Petra’s Attack * `70%`. The final damage is a random amount between 5% and 600% of that base value.

skills.name: Turn Card
skills.description: Petra reverses misfortune by healing a friendly hero with the lowest percentage of Health remaining based on the base value of Petra’s Attack * `140%`. The final Health restored is a random amount ranging between 5% and 400% of that base value.

skills.name: Evil Eye
skills.description: Grants all Squads’ Attack a 50% chance of cursing the target, increasing their damage taken by `50%`.

skills.name: The Favor
skills.description: Petra is known as a lucky fortune-teller to her soldiers, granting a 50% chance of increasing the Squads’ Attack by `50%`.

skills.name: The Shield
skills.description: Petra’s divination navigates bad outcomes with a 40% chance of reducing damage taken by `50%` for all squads.

hilde.name: Hilde
hilde.description: Hilde is a Mythic-quality Generation 2 hero in Kingshot, classified under the Cavalry class. You can unlock her through Daily Deals or the Hall of Governors event.

skills.name: Holy Invocation – Conquest Skill
skills.description: Soldiers swear by Hilde’s everyday miracles, increasing her healing effects by `70%`.

skills.name: Fortitude – Expedition Skill
skills.description: Hilde’s pious confidence in her cause is infectious, increasing Defender Squads’ Health by `15%`.

skills.name: Rejuvenating Plea
skills.description: Immediately restores Health equal to her Attack * `280%` to all friendly heroes.

skills.name: Redeemer
skills.description: Injury is no match for Hilde’s redeeming invocations. Immediately restores Health equal to her Attack * `140%` to the weakest friendly hero.

skills.name: Intimidation
skills.description: Psychological warfare is an age-old tactic. Disables the enemy target for 1s while dealing Attack * `196%` damage.

skills.name: Noble Path
skills.description: Hilde’s exhaustive discipline develops soldiers into true weapons, increasing the total squads’ Attack and Defense by `15%` and `10%`.

skills.name: Elixir of Strength
skills.description: Hilde uses her secret tonic to enhance the warriors’ strength, granting all squads’ attack a 25% chance of dealing `200%` damage.

skills.name: Trial by Fire
skills.description: Hilde’s devout prayer has a `40%` chance of reducing damage taken by 50% for all squads.

zoe.name: Zoe
zoe.description: Zoe is a Mythic-quality Generation 2 hero in Kingshot, classified under the Infantry class. You can unlock her through Hero Roulette.

skills.name: Death or Glory – Conquest Skill
skills.description: Zoe’s inner demon is awakened only by pain. Gaining a `24%` increased Attack until the end of the Battle once ‘Agony Rush’ is triggered.

skills.name: Dark Lady – Expedition Skill
skills.description: Zoe is a relentlessly demanding garrison commander, increasing Defender Squads’ Attack by `15%`.

skills.name: Shield Strike
skills.description: Zoe’s unpredictable attacks easily enweb foes, dealing Attack * `84%` damage every 0.5s and amplifying damage taken by the target by `30%` for 2s.

skills.name: Agony Rush
skills.description: Zoe requires pain to reach peak physical performance. She immediately regains `40%` of max Health under 50% Health. Can only activate once per battle.

skills.name: Holy Might
skills.description: Zoe inspires her fellow warriors to battle, boosting your heroes’ Attack Speed by `7%`.

skills.name: Sundering Wound
skills.description: Your squads’ attacks gain a 20% chance of inflicting Sunder, dealing `40%` damage per turn for 3 turns.

skills.name: Stoic
skills.description: Zoe is a gifted female orator, and her rousing battle speeches increase the total Squads’ Attack by `25%`.

skills.name: Infinite Arsenal
skills.description: Zoe strikes the enemy so completely and utterly that your squads’ attacks gain a 50% chance of amplifying enemy squads’ damage taken by `50%`.

marlin.name: Marlin
marlin.description: Marlin is a Mythic-quality Generation 2 hero in Kingshot, classified under the Archer class. You can unlock him through the Hall of Heroes.

skills.name: Servant of Wine – Conquest Skill
skills.description: There’s no battlefield pick-me-up like Marlin’s special brew, healing your weakest hero by Attack * `15%` with each basic attack.

skills.name: Admiral of the Line – Expedition Skill
skills.description: A true admiral leads from the front. Increases Rally Squads’ Lethality by `15%`.

skills.name: Tidal Rush
skills.description: Marlin is a tidal force on the battlefield, literally and figuratively, when he unleashes a pulse dealing `280%` Area of Effect damage and immobilizing the enemy for 1.5s.

skills.name: Fermented Blow
skills.description: Marlin’s deadly airborne concoction deals Attack * `70%` Area of Effect damage.

skills.name: Fermented Blow
skills.description: Marlin’s deadly airborne concoction deals Attack * `70%` Area of Effect damage.

skills.name: Wild Card
skills.description: Marlin, being unpredictable, has a 40% chance of increasing damage dealt by `50%` for all squads.

skills.name: Rumhead
skills.description: “Stiff rum can drown most any battlefield sorrow”. Marlin grants all squads a 20% chance of reducing the total Enemy Squads’ Lethality by 50% for 2 turns when attacking.

skills.name: Dynamo
skills.description: Grants your squads’ attack a 50% chance of increasing damage dealt by `50%`.

amane.name: Amane
amane.description: Amane (previously known as Mikoto) is an Epic hero in Kingshot, introduced with the June 26, 2025 update. She belongs to the Archer class and can be unlocked through Hero Recruitment and the Oasis & Beyond event

skills.name: Sakura Blossom
skills.description: Amane summons a protective enchantment, increasing all Hero and Escorts’ Attack by `3.5%` and Attack Speed by `4.5%` for 4s.

skills.name: Fire Sigil
skills.description: Amane lobs a fiery sigil against the enemy, dealing Attack * `210%` damage.

skills.name: Divine Melody
skills.description: The dance of the umbrella is the dance of the Blade. Every 3 basic attacks increases Amane’s Attack Speed by `5%` until the end of the battle.

skills.name: Tri-Phalanx
skills.description: Amane’s trademark formation increases all Squads’ total Attack by `25%`.

skills.name: Exorcism
skills.description: Amane’s skill at warding off evil increases Infirmary Healing Speed by `50%`.

yeonwoo.name: Yeonwoo
yeonwoo.description:
Yeonwoo is an Epic hero in Kingshot, introduced with the June 26, 2025 update. She belongs to the Archer class and can be unlocked through Hero Recruitment and the Oasis & Beyond event.

She’s a good joiner hero for Bear Hunt because her first skill boosts Lethality. Her second skill is an expedition skill that increases Academy research speed.

skills.name: Petalbloom
skills.description: Yeonwoo arcs Petalbloom outward in three waves, dealing Attack * 100%, Attack * `175%`, and Attack * `210%` damage respectively, with the third being area of effect damage.

skills.name: Falling Swallow
skills.description: The Falling Swallow technique weaves confusion in enemy ranks, dealing Attack * `140%` damage and reducing the target’s Attack Speed by `50%` for 2s.

skills.name: Twin Fangs
skills.description: Yeonwoo’s unusual duel form is devilishly difficult to defend against, increasing Attack by `24%`.

skills.name: On Guard
skills.description: “My blade and I are one”. Yeonwoo’s sword skills increase all Squads’ total Lethality by `25%`.

skills.name: Well-Traveled
skills.description: Yeonwoo’s travels have secured a technological edge, increasing Research Speed by `15%`.

fahd.name: Fahd
fahd.description: Fahd is an Epic hero in Kingshot, introduced with the June 26, 2025 update. He belongs to the Cavalry class and can be unlocked through Hero Recruitment and the Oasis & Beyond event.

skills.name: Sandstorm
skills.description: The blinding sandstorm reduces Enemy Squads’ Attack by `5%` for 2s.

skills.name: Eagle Wings
skills.description: After unleashing the “Sandstorm”, Fahd’s eagle directs allies’ attack, increasing his and nearby friendly Squads’ Attack by `35%` for 2s.

skills.name: Dune General
skills.description: The harsh desert has given Fahd a strong sense for when to pounce, increasing his Attack Speed by `30%`.

skills.name: Desert Eclipse
skills.description: A rising cloud of sand is terrible for visibility, reducing all Enemy Squads’ Damage Dealt by `20%`.

skills.name: Pathfinder
skills.description: https://kingshotdata.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/pathfinder-291x300.webp

jabel.name: Jabel
jabel.description: Jabel is a Mythic-quality Generation 1 hero in Kingshot, belonging to the Cavalry class. She is the easiest Mythic hero to unlock in Generation 1 since there are multiple ways to obtain her. The main methods include the 7-day sign-in gift for new players and hero recruitment in the Hero Hall.

skills.name: Crimson Spirit – Conquest Skill
skills.description: Jabel’s will to win helps breakthrough her limitation, increasing damage dealt by `30%`.

skills.name: Divine Strength – Expedition Skill
skills.description: Based on steadfast faith, Defender Troops’ Lethality is increased by `15%`.

skills.name: Gallant Throw
skills.description: Throws a spear that pierces defenses, dealing Attack * `252%` area of effect damage and pinning the targets for 1.5s.

skills.name: Brave the Storm
skills.description: A true knight bravely confronts enemies, dealing Attack * `210%` damage to the target.

skills.name: Persistence
skills.description: Adversity ignites endless potential, increasing Attack Speed by `60%` when Health is below 50%.

skills.name: Rally Flag `(LEAD)`
skills.description: Jabel with her banner-like red armor, has a `40%` chance of reducing damage taken by 50% for all squads.

skills.name: Hero’s Domain
skills.description: Jabel, a fearless knight, grants all squads a 50% chance of dealing `50%` more damage when attacking.

skills.name: Youthful Rage
skills.description: Jabel’s valiant spirit inspires everyone increasing damage dealt by `25%` for all squads.

helga.name: Helga
helga.description: Helga is a Mythic-quality Generation 1 hero in Kingshot. She belongs to the Infantry class, making her a melee hero specializing in close combat. You can unlock Helga by making your first purchase in the game.

skills.name: Valiant Fury – Conquest Skill
skills.description: Fueled by fury, Helga increases her damage dealt by `30%`.

skills.name: Zeal – Expedition Skill
skills.description: Helga joins the rally, increasing Rally Troops’ Lethality by `15%`.

skills.name: Antler Assault
skills.description: Performs an antler charge, dealing Attack * `224%` area of effect damage, knocking the targets back, and stunning them for 1s.

skills.name: Spear Charge
skills.description: Deals Attack * `210%` damage to the target.

skills.name: Fury
skills.description: When taking damage, there is a 10% chance of increasing Attack by `12%` for 3s. Stacks up to 5 times.

skills.name: Oath of Guardian `(LEAD)`
skills.description: Helga has a `40%` chance of reducing damage taken by 50% for all squads.

skills.name: Echoes of Valhalla
skills.description: Helga blows the horn to motivate the squad, increasing the total Squads’ Attack by `25%`.

skills.name: Nature’s Balance
skills.description: Helga invites everyone to embrace nature, increasing the total Squads’ Lethality by `25%`.

saul.name: Saul
saul.description: Saul is a Mythic-quality Generation 1 hero in Kingshot. He belongs to the Archer class, making him a ranged hero. You can unlock Saul through Daily Deals, Hero Roulette, Hall of Heroes, and the Swordland Shop.

skills.name: Fearless Advance – Conquest Skill
skills.description: Saul’s brust of strong determination under extreme situation increases his attack by `24%`.

skills.name: Defend to Attack – Expedition Skill
skills.description: Increases Defender Troops Attack by `15%`.

skills.name: Rapidfire
skills.description: Delivers multiple hits, each dealing Attack * `75%` damage each and stunning the target for 2s.

skills.name: Final Prayer
skills.description: When Health is below 50%, Saul’s Defense is increased by `150%`.

skills.name: Superior Techniques
skills.description: Increases Attack Speed by `30%`.

skills.name: Taskforce Training
skills.description: As a member of the task force, Saul’s unique training program is highly empowering, increasing the total Squads’ Defense and Health by `10%` and `15%`.

skills.name: Resourceful
skills.description: Saul’s efficient construction management increases Construction Speed by 15%, and his proficiency in maximizing resource utilization reduces Construction Costs by `15%`.

skills.name: Positional Batter
skills.description: Sault masterfully manipulates the battlefield, increasing the total Squads’ Lethality by `25%`.

amadeus.name: Amadeus
amadeus.description: Amadeus is a Generation 1 Infantry hero in Kingshot. You can unlock him through the Hall of Governors or buy VIP special packs. Once Generation 1 ends, VIP special packs are the only way to unlock him.

skills.name: Double Parry – Conquest Skill
skills.description: Amadeus is a skillful parrier, reducing damage taken by `30%`.

skills.name: Discernment – Expedition Skill
skills.description: Amadeus attacks in a sword-tailored formation, increasing Rally Attack by `15%`.

skills.name: Combo Slash
skills.description: Amadeus casts enemies in the target area upward followed by three powerful slashes, each dealing Attack * `224%` damage.

skills.name: Arcane Swordship
skills.description: Amadeus releases a burst of arcane energy with each sword slash, dealing Attack * `23%` damage to frontal foes.

skills.name: Onslaught
skills.description: Amadeus is a master at pressing his advantage, increasing Attack by `48%` when Health is below 50%.

skills.name: Battle Ready
skills.description: Young ranger Amadeus excels in boosting morale, increasing the total Squads’ Lethality by `25%`.

skills.name: Way of the Blade
skills.description: Amadeus imparts the secrets of swordsmanship, increasing the total Squads’ Attack by `25%`.

skills.name: Unrighteous Strike
skills.description: Amadeus’ unique swordplay has a `40%` chance of increasing damage dealt by 50% for all squads.

chenko.name: Chenko
chenko.description:
Chenko is an Epic Hero from the Cavalry class in Kingshot. You can unlock her in a few ways — through the Path of Growth event (which happens in new kingdoms), through hero recruitment, or by getting her shards from Intel Missions. Unlike most heroes who only need 10 shards to recruit, Chenko needs 40 shards for her recruitment.

She’s considered a top-tier joiner hero mainly because of her expedition skills, especially her first skill, “Stand of Arms,” which is useful for dealing damage to the Bear during the Bear Hunt event.

skills.name: Burst Fire
skills.description: Unleashes a rapid barrage, dealing Attack * `75%` damage to enemies in front every 0.5s for 2s.

skills.name: Defense Upgrade
skills.description: Chenko upgrades her armor, increasing Defense by `70%`.

skills.name: Weapon Upgrade
skills.description: Chenko’s upgraded weapon boosts Attack by `24%`.

skills.name: https://kingshotdata.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/weapon-upgrade-290x300.webp
skills.description: Chenko implements advanced weaponry for our soldiers, increasing the total Squads’ Lethality by `25%`.

skills.name: Shield Wall
skills.description: Enhances troop armor with a keen engineering eye, reducing damage taken by `20%` for all troops.

gordon.name: Gordon
gordon.description:
Gordon is an Epic Hero from the Cavalry class in Kingshot. You can unlock him through Hero Recruitment, Intel Missions, or by getting his shards from the Alliance Championship store.

He’s mainly used as a joiner hero for Garrison because of his first expedition skill, which provides a Health boost.

skills.name: BBQ Feast
skills.description: Gordon prepares a lavish feast, restoring Health by Attack * `280%` to all troops and increasing Attack by `7%` for all troops for 4s.

skills.name: Culinary Chaos
skills.description: Gordon’s life in a chaotic kitchen reduces his damage taken by `30%`.

skills.name: Emergency Snack
skills.description: Gordon’s regular snacking restores Health equal to Attack * `70%` every 5s.

skills.name: Super Nutrients `(LEAD)`
skills.description: Gordon’s culinary masterpieces invigorate our soldiers, increasing total Squads’ Health by `25%`.

skills.name: Trash Talk
skills.description: Beyond delicious meals, Gordon’s trash talk increases the total Squads’ Attack by `25%`.

diana.name: Diana
diana.description:
Diana is an Epic Hero from the Archer class in Kingshot. You can unlock her only through the Desert Trial event.

She’s a must-have because her expedition skills cut down Stamina Cost for Rallies and Marches, plus she can boost March Speed by up to 100% when fully upgraded. Just keep in mind that these effects only work if she’s part of the rally or march.

skills.name: Incendiary Arrows
skills.description: Diana fires an Incendiary Shot, dealing Attack * `290%` damage to the target and Attack * `98%` damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Sharpshooter
skills.description: Increases Attack Speed by `30%`.

skills.name: Deadly Strike
skills.description: With a sharp eye for vulnerabilities, Diana increases her Crit Rate by `20%`.

skills.name: Iron Constitution `(LEAD)`
skills.description: The unique arts of the wilderness rangers reduce Governor Stamina Cost by `20%`.

skills.name: Quick Paced
skills.description: Increases March Speed by 100%.

howard.name: Howard
howard.description: Howard is an Epic Hero from the Infantry class in Kingshot. You can get his shards through Hero Recruitment, Conquest Battles, and Intel Missions.

skills.name: Shielded Strike
skills.description: Howard gives an enemy a solid whack with his heavy shield, knocking the target back while dealing Attack * `280%` Area of Effect damage.

skills.name: Joint Defense
skills.description: Howard leads the effort to fortify defenses, increasing Defense by `15%` for all heroes.

skills.name: Shield Block
skills.description: Howard trades in his shield for an upgraded model, reducing damage taken by `30%`.

skills.name: Defenders’ Edge `(LEAD)`
skills.description: Howard guards our troops with his shield, reducing damage taken by `20%` for all troops.

skills.name: Weaken
skills.description: Howard’s intimidating presence reduces the total Enemy Squads’ Attack by 20%.

quinn.name: Quinn
quinn.description: Quinn is an Epic Hero from the Archer class in Kingshot. He’s unlocked during the tutorial, and you can also get his shards through Hero Recruitment or Intel Missions.

skills.name: Headshot
skills.description: The upgraded Crossbow deals Attack * `560%` damage.

skills.name: Quick Shot
skills.description: Years of training increases Quinn’s Attack Speed by `30%.`

skills.name: Natural Selection
skills.description: Quinn’s expert survival skills increase his damage dealt by `30%`.

skills.name: Sixth Sense `(LEAD)`
skills.description: Senses for dangers ahead, reducing damage taken by `20%` for all troops.

skills.name: Precision Shot
skills.description: Quinn grants all soldiers a 50% chance of dealing `50%` more damage when attacking.

olive.name: Olive
olive.description:
Olive is a Rare Hero from the Archer class in Kingshot. You can unlock her through Hero Recruitment, Intel Missions, and Conquest Battles.

She is a growth-focused hero who boosts your Town’s Bread Output and also increases Bread Gathering Speed when included in a gathering march.

skills.name: Rain of Arrows
skills.description: Olive launches a hail of arrows, dealing Attack * `252%` Area of Effect Damage around the target.

skills.name: Target Lock
skills.description: Olive paints a bullseye on a target, raising damage inflicted on the target by `30%` for this attack.

skills.name: Green Thumb
skills.description: Olive’s unmatched baking skills increase the Town’s Mill Output by `25%`.

skills.name: Forager’s Luck
skills.description: Olive’s expertise in logistics increases her Resource Gathering Speed in the Wilderness by `25%`.

edwin.name: Edwin
edwin.description:
Edwin is a Rare Hero from the Cavalry class in Kingshot. You can unlock him through Hero Recruitment, Intel Missions, and Conquest Battles.

He’s a growth-focused hero who boosts your Town’s Stone Output and also increases Stone Gathering Speed when included in a gathering march.

skills.name: Shrapnel Load
skills.description: Edwin throws out a homemade explosive, dealing Attack * `196%` Area of Effect Damage to the target and its nearby enemies.

skills.name: Detonate
skills.description: Edwin’s explosives have a `20%` chance of stunning the targets for `1.5s`.

skills.name: Demolitions Expert
skills.description: Edwin uses his knowledge of minerals, increasing the Town’s Quarry Output by `25%`.

skills.name: Stone Mining
skills.description: Edwin’s expert quarrying techniques increase his Stone Mining Speed in the Wilderness by `25%`.

seth.name: Seth
seth.description:
Seth is a Rare Hero from the Infantry class in Kingshot. You can unlock him through Hero Recruitment, Intel Missions, and Conquest Battles.

He’s a growth-focused hero who boosts your Town’s Iron Output and also increases Iron Gathering Speed when included in a gathering march.

skills.name: Hammer Burn
skills.description: Seth swings his hammer forward in a devastating arc, dealing Attack * `280%` damage.

skills.name: Armor Enhancement
skills.description: Seth upgrades his armor to reduce damage taken by `30%`.

skills.name: Burnished Iron
skills.description: Seth passes on his passion for iron mining to everyone, increasing the Town’s Iron Output by `25%`.

skills.name: Craftsmanship
skills.description: Seth has a special bond with Iron, increasing his Iron Mining Speed in the Wilderness by `25%`.

forrest.name: Forrest
forrest.description:
Forrest is a Rare Hero from the Infantry class in Kingshot. You can unlock him through Hero Recruitment, Intel Missions, and Conquest Battles.

He’s a growth-focused hero who boosts your Town’s Wood Output and also increases Wood Gathering Speed when included in a gathering march.

skills.name: Axe Whirl
skills.description: Forrest’s axe pirouette deals damage of Attack * `110%` per 0.5s to nearby enemies for 3s.

skills.name: Razor Sharp
skills.description: Forrest’s sharpened axe deals `30%` more damage per second.

skills.name: Woodland Inheritor
skills.description: Forrest’s expert lumberjack skills increase the Town’s Sawmill Output by `25%`.

skills.name: Master Woodcutter
skills.description: Forrest utilizes his logging expertise, increasing Wood Gathering Speed in the Wilderness by `25%`.
